defense.Wiki: Object attack power below this value causes no damage

materialId.Wiki: Material ID. Treated the same as floor material. When it is -1, the behavior is the same as before.

isSaveBreakState.Wiki: Whether to save the destruction state in save data

isBreakByPlayerCollide.Wiki: Will the object break by coming into contact with the player?

isDisableBreakForFirstAppear.Wiki: Broken at the initial appearance of the player?

isAnimPauseOnRemoPlay.Wiki: Whether to stop the animation during the movie

isRopeBridge.Wiki: Is it a suspension bridge object?

isAddRigidImpulse_ByDamage.Wiki: Whether the rigid body is blown away by damage

isBreak_ByChrRide.Wiki: Will it break if a character rides it?

isBreakByEnemyCollide.Wiki: Will the object break by coming into contact with Npc's

breakSfxCpId.Wiki: SFX generation position dummy poly ID when object is destroyed (-1: model center, -2: placement position)

breakBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Bullet shot when the object breaks

breakBulletCpId.Wiki: Dummypoly the bullet spawns from (-1: Placement position)

breakFallHeight.Wiki: Height at which the object breaks when falling (0: it does not break when falling)

camAvoidType.Wiki: What to do when an object blocks the camera and player

breakStopTime.Wiki: Time from when the rigid body is forcibly stopped after being destroyed (0 means no forced stop)

burnBraekRate.Wiki: Burnup threshold for switching to destructive state

burnBulletBehaviorId.Wiki: Bullet shot while the object is burning

burnBulletBehaviorId_1.Wiki: Bullet shot while the object is burning

burnBulletBehaviorId_2.Wiki: Bullet shot while the object is burning

burnBulletBehaviorId_3.Wiki: Bullet shot while the object is burning

burnBulletInterval.Wiki: Interval at which fire spread bullets are generated (frames)

burnBulletDelayTime.Wiki: Time to delay fire spread bullet generation (seconds)

burnSfxDelayTimeMin.Wiki: Minimum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_1.Wiki: Minimum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_1. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_2.Wiki: Minimum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_2. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMin_3.Wiki: Minimum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_3. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMax.Wiki: Maximum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_1.Wiki: Maximum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_1. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_2.Wiki: Maximum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_2. Randomly determined between start and end time

burnSfxDelayTimeMax_3.Wiki: Maximum SFX generation delay time during combustion for burnSfxId_3. Randomly determined between start and end time

BreakAiSoundID.Wiki: AI sound ID generated when destroyed

FragmentInvisibleWaitTime.Wiki: Fragment material ID (-1: Do not hide)

RigidPenetrationScale_Soft.Wiki: Rigid body soft contact settings Collision point distance coefficient [Soft]

RigidPenetrationScale_Normal.Wiki: Rigid body soft contact settings Collision point distance coefficient [Normal]

RigidPenetrationScale_Hard.Wiki: Rigid body soft contact settings Collision point distance factor [Hard]

LandTouchSfxId.Wiki: SFXID when touching terrain (-1: offset by terrain material)

isDamageCover.Wiki: Whether or not to pass the damage to the opposite side when receiving damage (0: Pass, 1: Do not pass)

isUserPhysicForChrCollide.Wiki: After collision destruction, is it possible to perform Havok processing and re-destruction with the same shape?

paintDecalTargetTextureSize.Wiki: Paint decal target size (0 to 4096, only powers of 2 allowed)

lifeTime_forDC.Wiki: Time until the dynamically generated Obj disappears after being created (0: does not disappear)

clothUpdateDist.Wiki: Distance from the camera to update havokCloth (0: Always update)

contactSeId.Wiki: ID of the SE that plays when touched by the local player you control (-1: does not play)

breakLandingSfxId.Wiki: Identifier of object material-dependent SFX that plays when it first lands after being destroyed (-1: does not occur)

extHitSfx_S.Wiki: ID of the SFX issued at the same time as the landing SFX. Information other than attack strength [SFX] (such as material) is not considered. (-1: No SFX)

extHitSfx_M.Wiki: ID of the SFX issued at the same time as the landing SFX. Information other than attack strength [SFX] (such as material) is not considered. (-1: No SFX)

extHitSfx_L.Wiki: ID of the SFX issued at the same time as the landing SFX. Information other than attack strength [SFX] (such as material) is not considered. (-1: No SFX)

extHitSfx_LL.Wiki: ID of the SFX issued at the same time as the landing SFX. Information other than attack strength [SFX] (such as material) is not considered. (-1: No SFX)

extHitSfx_LLL.Wiki: ID of the SFX issued at the same time as the landing SFX. Information other than attack strength [SFX] (such as material) is not considered. (-1: No SFX)

breakSfxOffsetX.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for 'SFX dummy poly ID at destruction'

breakSfxOffsetY.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for 'SFX dummy poly ID at destruction'

breakSfxOffsetZ.Wiki: Coordinates to offset for 'SFX dummy poly ID at destruction'

isEnableWallJump.Wiki: Can the player wall jump off this object?

doesStopPlayerDockedMove.Wiki: Whether to stop when it comes into contact with a PC that is docked and moving

isDisableEnvMapCapture.Wiki: Do not shoot when shooting an environment map

autoDrawGroupPassPixel.Wiki: When generating an automatic drawing group, if more than this number of pixels are visible, a drawing group flag will be set. (-1: Default value. Defined in game.properties Draw.AutoDrawGroup.PassPixelNum)

autoDrawGroupDisableDepthWrite.Wiki: Set it on the door etc.

useExpandVolume.Wiki: Use when you want to widen the visibility judgment in automatic drawing groups. Even though the 'visible judgment' is expanded, the occlusion by this model remains the same

SpecialEffectId_InsideHit.Wiki: Special effect ID to be applied to the character within the hit. Valid only if the collision detection type is 'No camera, lock, or damage, Only damage, or Only damage, but no bullets.'

expandVolumeX_plus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the expansion distance in the +X direction and the expansion distance in the -X direction separately.

expandVolumeX_minus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the expansion distance in the +X direction and the expansion distance in the -X direction separately.

expandVolumeY_plus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the upward expansion distance and downward expansion distance separately

expandVolumeY_minus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the upward expansion distance and downward expansion distance separately

expandVolumeZ_plus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the expansion distance in the +Z direction and the expansion distance in the -Z direction separately.

expandVolumeZ_minus.Wiki: In the automatic drawing group, extend the visibility judgment area from the model bounding box. Specify the expansion distance in the +Z direction and the expansion distance in the -Z direction separately.

camDitherFadeMinDist.Wiki: Camera dither fade minimum distance. Setting both 'Camera dither fade minimum distance' and 'Camera dither fade maximum distance' to '0.0' disables camera dither fade.

camDitherFadeMaxDist.Wiki: Maximum camera dither fade distance. Setting both 'Camera dither fade minimum distance' and 'Camera dither fade maximum distance' to '0.0' disables camera dither fade.
